text: Its crystal clear with a huge, creamy, white head. The aroma has notes of clovey yeast, fruit and wheat. The sweet flavor has notes of yeast, banana, and wheat, and the finish is spicy. It has surprisingly much flavor considering its a Kristall - lovely!

500 ml bottle. Thanks Timo A.
Pours a golden colour with a lacy white head. Aroma of grains, hay and some weak papery notes. Flavour of grainy malts, wheat, citrus, pear and some weak banana notes. Medium bodied, soft carbonation and a wheaty, grainy finish. Finishes dry and grainy. Good drinkability.

Pours an extremely pale gold, and has great head retention. Generous amounts of grain on the nose, with a subtle spice. Very lively on the palate and the fresh grain taste does not linger whatsoever. 
All in all I would dub this a delicious grain pop, that would be well suited for a hot sunny afternoon. Very drinkable.
Bottle many thanks to Quack-Duck. Light golden color with medium long lasting color. Strong banana in aroma. Taste, light banana, wheat, peaches. Fruity finish with touch of bitterness. Good.

Aromatisch-hopfiger Geruch. Im Start sehr aromareich, süßlich-würzig. Der Mittelteil weist zudem einige bitterhopfige Sprenkel auf, während der Schluß mildmalzig ausklingt. 
Sehr angenehm. Test vom 29.10.2008, Gebinde: Glasflasche
A crystal clear wheat that is nice to drink. Refreshingly fizzy almost a thirst quencher. O.K.
The bottle looks good, the beer in the glass also. Tastes fruity and yeasty. The finish is a bit dry, all in all very fresh and zippy. Good one!

bottle, thank you Frankenland. Clear golden yellow, large head. Fruity nose. Fruity flavours dominate, especially banana and peach. Malty, with some spicy hops in the finish. Refershing and very pleasant Kristallweizen.
Bottle, thanks Pivnizub. Clove/spice nose. Clear golden, huge head. Light whitebread flavor, a bit banana, papery finish. Light body.

Bottle: Clear golden coloured, huge fluffy head, whither than white, "slow" carbonation visible; moderate tart fruity (or grapefruity) nose with a touch of bananas; moderate sweet-bitter-sourish flavour, light to medium-bodied, creamy MF; mild citric and wheaty finish. Not very impressive, but a decent thirst-quencher..........
bottled. has a bit more character than most kristalls. quite light and pale and clear. lemon meringue and clove aroma, some apple juice sweetness and light wheat tartness
